• Provide products & services - credit, linkage of organic farming, marketing, packaging, processing, and their entitlement benefits. 
•  Improve well being – increase income of a supported family by Rs. 1000/- per month. Reduce health expenditure of family by Rs. 500/- and increase enrollment of children to the school.
lenders.occupational_info:
The PSVK was started by help of few social workers to initiate unique model of social work, Self Help Group Creation, formal education and computer education through community participation first in Patna district of Bihar and further replicated in other district of Bihar and Jharkhand.
 PSVK visualizes to create a value added society based on social justice, unity, integrity, equality, peace trust and freedom through community organization, participation and empowerment by providing equal access to right to food, clothing, shelter, education, health and information

lenders.name: Sacha
lenders.loan_because:
My hope is that an economically sound injection of capital (i.e. a loan) into poor communities will ripple in the local economy, resulting in a large benefit for a small investment. My money and my absorption of the risk of these loans allows the process to happen faster than before.

I also believe that Kiva, and microlending in general, is not a substitute for charity or government-based initiatives aimed at helping those in need. Instead, Kiva bridges the gap between the needs of the destitute and the needs of the middle class.

lenders.name: Kenneth Copeland
lenders.occupational_info:
After the Sept. 11 attacks on America in 2001, Kenneth Copeland Ministries began an assault on the fear that plagued Christians. It was the next step in the ministry’s 40-year mission to preach the uncompromised Word of God and proclaim from the top of the world to the bottom and all the way around that “Jesus Is Lord!” Since that time, founder Kenneth Copeland has produced many written, audio and video resources to help others develop the fruit of the spirit of love in their lives and remove the fear that paralyzes them.

Kenneth Copeland Ministries

Kenneth Copeland on myspace.com
http://www.myspace.com/kencopeminnet 
squidoo.com | Gloria Copeland

lenders.name: Tan
lenders.loan_because: i need some piano lessons on jazz so that i can teach others or perform in a pub.
lenders.occupational_info:
it has been 2 years since i graduated from senior high school.
i held a small shop selling toys and souvenirs with the help of my parents and unfortunately it's closed down for some both financial & faulty reasons.and now, my parents wouldn't help me anymore and i left my hometown(i was living in south China and now i'm in mid China). i used to work in a shop which sells musical instruments and i get fired for i played the piano someday during the noon and it was the third time that the manager warned me not to play the piano(though i play it in a low sound).  without a diploma from a college, i can't find any job with a normal payment in China.which kind of job i can find is that they offer you 2 meals( lunch and supper) per day and maybe pay off your monthly pay later after you worked there reaching up to 3 months. i've nothing to say about the politics and educational system in china , but i know my situation and i decided to take a try here once an american friend kindly told me this website.

lenders.name: Jane Morrison
lenders.loan_because: Women are partners in the care of the world and they need opportunities to share their creative and entrpreneurial talents. Women are hardworking, industrial, inclusive, and passionate leaders of all sorts of initiatives that serve their community, children and improve economic status. I am passionate about helping others succeed, learn and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mentor and  teacher and share my wisdom about how to be  smart and effective small business owners.

lenders.name: lito
lenders.loan_because: Gamayng tabang...

lenders.name: Nermin Hadzikadunic
lenders.occupational_info: Working with business to have great presence on the internet.

lenders.name: Mojdah
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help those who need it all over the world and the $$ goes a long way
lenders.occupational_info: I make teeth straight :)

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I'm awfully lucky to be where I am , doing what I do. Kiva is one way to acknowledge this.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research into the problems that older people have with their bodies and minds. I also do research into the care that is provided to these people.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase goods and services used by a county government.

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.loan_because: I have the possibility.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected
lenders.occupational_info: I work with ACCION USA, a U.S. microfinance institution.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I like self sufficiency.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: As I woman I believe it is my responsibility to assist other women when ever possible.   There are many women assisting me in my endeavors to become more successful.  It is only right that I pass that on to others.  We all need to give a hand up to a sister when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a crafter.  I love turning a piece of wood into a beautiful plaque inscribed with clever sayings and Words To Ponder.....

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I am convinced that the way out of poverty has to do with opportunities, not with charity
lenders.occupational_info: My work is my daily chance of giving back to others what I've received from life, since having good health, an education, a family, is a blessing

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help others when you can.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a person's drive to rise above

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: To help individuals start new business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor of Foot and Ankle

lenders.name: Beth and Bill
lenders.loan_because: we believe we're all in this life together as a Global family.  Kiva is just one way to say Thank You for this blessing!
lenders.occupational_info: Our work in retirement is a daily journey of recognizing and pursuing the opportunities God places before us.  Loving our neighbors through Kiva is just one expression of that pursuit.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I can.  (Yo puedo.)
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a scientist.  I use the Hubble Space Telescope and telescopes in Chile to try to understand how galaxies formed.  

Yo soy una científica.  Uso el telescopio Hubble y los telescopios en Chile, por estudiar las galaxias.

lenders.name: Jerry R Reynolds
lenders.loan_because: I am a reflection of poverty and know with opportunity, people can make long term changes for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Think tank, creative, insperational and motivated to solve problems by looking at issues differently.

lenders.occupation: retired pharmaceutical sales rep. hosp. specialist

lenders.name: St.Thomas Elgin Interact
lenders.loan_because: It is our international project.
lenders.occupational_info: Service above Self

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently going to school to get an education

lenders.loan_because: I want to help small business owners improve their lives and improve the economy in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I sort mail for an insurance company.

lenders.name: Elan
lenders.loan_because: Mainly loaning out to my people.

lenders.name: Mairin
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going into grade 10 at Victoria school of the Arts.

lenders.name: Kristian & Marie
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the monetary wedding gifts we received.

lenders.name: jmca/tbaril
lenders.loan_because: To provide an opportunity to increase the happiness and quality of life in another persons life.  We believe the microloan program will have a greater  impact  for the cost than any other program in which we could participate.  We are thankful to participate and extend best wishes to all.
lenders.occupational_info: James teaches science at a 4-year college.  Christina is a nurse.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: Dependence on handouts is a curse. I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Helping Others goes a long way...
lenders.occupational_info: We are reaching out 2 the world to open there mind and eyes to see the bigger picture in hopes we can help others suceed and make alot of money too be financially independent and live the happiest and best life  that they never thought was possible...

lenders.name: Sidni and Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: we can and we want to be part of the solution . We believe in women's strength and want to give them as many opportunities as possible to excel.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both teachers: middle school and college.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: work makes us free.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I consider it not only my moral, but my spiritual duty to aid those in need.  I have been helped numerous times, and by the grace of God, I still exist to do His work.

lenders.name: Kent & Nanette
lenders.loan_because: it feels good, allows us to support individuals who are productive and creative, and we hope it keeps hand making viable. When we travel we want to buy textiles and art handmade by the local people.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.occupation: Legal analyst for an investment bank
lenders.loan_because: Non-profit lending after hours makes up for all my for-profit lending during the day

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and sell biodegradable hand wash and traditional bar soaps.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: I have received many blessings from God during my lifetime and I enjoy being able to share these blessings financially, with someone less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I enter information from doctors into a computer so that medicines can be given to people who are ill , elderly or mentally or physically challenged.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I like making someone's a day a little bit brighter than it was when they woke up in the morning.
